info.title: Sales Contract (A2X)
info.description: The service contains header and item entities, as well as their sub-entities for partners and pricing elements. Once the sales contract has been created, the sales contract number is sent in the response with the data included in the sales contract. If there are any issues when creating, retrieving, updating, or deleting the sales contract, the system displays error messages in the response.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete sales contracts using this synchronous inbound service

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Sales: Sales Document (SD_SALESDOC)
* Sales: Sales Document Item (SD_SALESDOCITEM)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.summary: Reads all sales contract headers.
get.description: Reads the header data of all sales contracts in the system.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionorderby)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.description: Creates a header of a sales contract. The consumer can use deep insert requests. This means the consumer can include the following entities in the payload:header partner, header pricing element, header text, sales contract item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.

get.summary: Reads the header of a specific sales contract.
get.description: Reads the header data of a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

patch.summary: Updates the header of a specific sales contract.
patch.description: Updates the header data of a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number.

delete.description: Deletes a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number.

get.summary: Reads items of a specific sales contract.
get.description: Reads item data from the header of a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.summary: Creates one or more items for a specific sales contract.
post.description: Creates item data for a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number. The consumer must also pass the sales contract number in the payload.

get.summary: Reads the header-level partners of a specific sales contract.
get.description: Reads partner data from the header of a specific sales contract, which the consumer specifies by passing the sales contract number.

parameters.name: $filter

post.summary: Creates the header partners of a specific sales contract.
post.description: Creates the partner data from the header of a specific sales contract. Consumers must pass the following key fields: sales contract ID and partner function.The data is relevant for all items for which no item-specific partners are maintained.

post.description: Releases the approval request for a specific sales contract. Consumer must pass the sales contract number.
Rejects the approval request for a specific sales contract. Consumer must pass the sales contractnumber.

Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items, see [Paging - Top](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptiontop)

skip.name: $skip
